General.Name: RXO Inc.
General.Description: RXO, Inc. provides full truckload freight transportation brokering services. The company also offers brokered services for managed transportation, last mile, and freight forwarding. RXO, Inc. was founded in 2022 and is based in Charlotte, North Carolina.
General.Address: 11215 North Community House Road, Charlotte, NC, United States, 28277
